Introduction

This Manual describes the source code of the LibUtil component. It provides the complete documentation of the component's internals as well as the detailed descriptions of the functions and structures exported to programmers such as the application interface.

For more information about this software component follow the links at the bottom of this page or the tree control on the left side.

Purpose

The purpose of the manual is to provide a comprehensive description of the component software. The main section of this documentation focuses on the application interface of the Libutil.

Functionality

To integrate the Libutil into your software application the following files are needed:

  • libutil.a - the library file containing the compiled source code of the OSAL
  • util_api.h - the interface header containing the application interface of the Libutil including data types and function prototypes.

The following dependencies are needed by OSAL:

  • libosal - the OSAL library (Operating System Abstraction Layer). For further informations about the OSAL and it's dependencies see the OSAL Software Manual.
